summary: The sexual misadventures of Timothy Lea and his brother-in-law Sidney Noggett when they set up a driving school business.
cast: Robin Askwith|Anthony Booth|Sheila White|Doris Hare|Bill Maynard|Windsor Davies|Liz Fraser|Irene Handl|George Layton|Lynda Bellingham|Avril Angers|Maxine Casson|Chrissy Iddon|Ballard Berkeley|Suzy Mandel|Sally Faulkner|Peter Godfrey|Damaris Hayman|John Junkin|Anthony Morton|Geoffrey Hughes|Sally Adez|Donald Hewlett|Daniel Chamberlain|Rocky Taylor|Bill Hemmings|Christopher Driscoll|Matt Kilroy|Terry Richards|Lewis Collins|Robert Putt|Peter Green|Peter O'Farrell|Ron Dee|Stephen Calcutt|Tim Stern|Sam Kydd|Timothy Blackstone
title: Confesiones de un instructor
